mapper.select: SELECT id, free_num,free_context, create_date, update_date, view_rate, free_category, free_like, title FROM free_board ORDER BY free_num desc
SELECT id ,freeNum,freeContext, createDate,updateDate,viewRate, freeCategory,freeLike,title FROM free_board WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board (id, free_num, free_context, create_date, update_date, view_rate, free_category, free_like, title) VALUES (#{id}, seq_free_board.nextval, #{freeContext}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{viewRate}, #{freeCategory}, #{freeLike}, #{title})
